nodes.text: Darth Victun was a Dark Lord of the Sith and member of the reconstituted Sith Empire's ruling Dark Council around 4043 BBY. Victun and fellow Dark Council member Darth Qalar fought a violent Kaggath, a ritual Sith duel, that obliterated the Imperial Citadel on Dromund Kaas, the Imperial capital planet. When the two called a draw, both Qalar and Victun were executed by the other members of the Dark Council, and their assets were used in the reconstruction while the two's family lines were eliminated.

Darth Victun was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Imperial Citadel in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, though the Sith's name was not revealed until the release of the game's companion Encyclopedia.
